channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gemini Space Station stock price skyrockets as Winklevoss crypto firm wins prediction market approval
item.description: Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss are taking Gemini Space Station Inc. into the prediction market space. The cryptocurrency exchange’s CEO and president, r...

item.title: Reimagine What Banking Means
item.description: From life’s milestones to life’s hardest moments, financial institutions need to do more to build relationships.

item.title: What it takes to be wealthy in America: $2.3 million, Charles Schwab says
item.description: Survey respondents said it feels like it takes more money to feel wealthy today compared to last year.

item.title: How Canva Became the Power Player in the AI Design Wars
item.description: The $42 billion Australian firm democratized design. Is an IPO next?

item.title: What the Fed’s rate cut means for your mortgage, credit cards, and more

item.title: The goverment is vibe coding now

item.title: Trump’s tariffs have cost U.S. households $1,200 each, Democrats say
item.description: Sweeping taxes on imports have cost the average American household nearly $1,200 since Donald Trump returned to the White House this year, according t...

item.title: Exclusive: Crypto startup LI.FI raises $29 million for cross-blockchain price discovery tool
item.description: The company aims to make moving across blockchains more efficient.

item.title: Netflix’s takeover of Warner Brothers is a nightmare for consumers
item.description: Netflix promotes itself as an innovator, but its skyhigh bid for Warner Brothers suggests that its trendsetter days have peaked.

item.title: A San Francisco woman just gave birth in a Waymo robotaxi—and Waymo says it’s not the first time that’s happened
item.description: “We’re proud to be a trusted ride for moments big and small, serving riders from just seconds old to many years young,” Waymo said.

item.title: Trump slams Fed’s third-straight rate cut as ‘too small,’ saying he wishes it was twice as large
item.description: Three Fed officials dissented from the move, the most dissents in six years and a sign of deep divisions on the committee.

item.title: This Startup’s New Product Is Targeting Plastic Pollution With a Novel Kind of Recyclable Packaging
item.description: Exclusive: Cove has developed a fiber-based bottle platform that is designed to be recycled like paper. They plan to make million of units.

item.title: Coca-Cola announces its new CEO, company veteran Henrique Braun

item.title: VC Heading for Lowest Year Since 2017
item.description: A recent PitchBook report reveals steep downward trend.

item.title: To Use AI the Right Way, Start by Auditing Your Company’s Operating Model
item.description: AI isn’t just another tool layer to plug into existing structures. It fundamentally changes how work should flow.
